alert.note: Alert for Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 1:31AM CDT until May 24 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... Southern Hale County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Lamb County in northwestern Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Anton, or 15 miles west of Abernathy, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Abernathy, Shallowater, Idalou, Petersburg, Anton, Lubbock International Airport and New Deal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
